name: Agartha
description: Agartha is an puzzle platformer where you play various adventurers carving out their way through countless levels using very limited resources.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista Processor: Pentium 2117U 1.8GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 or higher resolution Storage: 200 MB available space
